trans-unit.source: Returns data from a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i dati da un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: `RecognizerUpdateReached` events provide a mechanism for pausing a speech recognition engine to apply atomic and synchronous modifications, such as loading and unloading grammars.
trans-unit.target: `RecognizerUpdateReached`gli eventi forniscono un meccanismo per la sospensione di un motore di riconoscimento vocale per applicare le modifiche atomiche e sincrone, ad esempio il caricamento e scaricamento le grammatiche.

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione utilizza un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>per gestire il riconoscimento dell'istanza, è possibile utilizzare uno del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodi per richiedere che il motore viene sospeso per la ricezione di un aggiornamento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>istanza genera un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>evento quando è pronto per l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Mentre un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>istanza è sospesa, è possibile caricare, scaricare, abilitare e disabilitare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti e modificare i valori per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione utilizza un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>per gestire il riconoscimento dell'istanza, è possibile utilizzare uno del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodi per richiedere che il motore viene sospeso per la ricezione di un aggiornamento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>istanza genera un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>evento quando è pronto per l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Mentre un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>istanza è sospesa, è possibile caricare, scaricare, abilitare e disabilitare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: When handling <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> events, a recognition engine pauses until the event handler returns.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestiscono <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>degli eventi, un motore di riconoscimento viene sospeso fino a quando non restituisce il gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio position associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione audio associata all'evento.

trans-unit.source: Applications can use the location indicated by AudioPosition to access audio input that occurred while the recognition engine was paused.
trans-unit.target: Applicazioni possono utilizzare il percorso indicato dall'indicatore AudioPosition accedano input audio che si è verificato durante il motore di riconoscimento è stata sospesa.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location within the speech buffer of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> when it pauses and raises a `RecognizerUpdateReached` event.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione all'interno del buffer di riconoscimento vocale di un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> quando sospende e genera un `RecognizerUpdateReached` evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the `UserToken` passed to the system when an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate*> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il `UserToken` passato al sistema quando un'applicazione chiama <> </> *> o <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: An application specifies a `UserToken` when it requests the generation of a `RecognizerUpdateReached` event by calling one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods that take a `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione specifica un `UserToken` quando richiede la generazione di un `RecognizerUpdateReached` evento chiamando uno del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i metodi che accettano un `userToken` parametro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that contains the `UserToken`.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto che contiene il `UserToken`.
